featured.text: This created a convenient, sturdy platform for any person too short to reach the sink.
The platform is supported by two pieces of metal.

definition.zh_def: 平台：一種用於支撐或提供服務的基礎結構或系統。
definition.en_def: Platform: A structure or system that supports or provides a service.
definition.example: The new social media platform allows users to connect with friends easily.
